alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 18 at 3:31AM MST until December 18 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility of one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains, Tooele and Rush Valleys, Eastern Box Elder County, Northern Wasatch Front and Salt Lake Valley. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The fog will impact travel along area roadways including portions of I-15 from Salt Lake County north to Brigham City, I-80 from the mouth of Parleys Canyon to near Wendover, portions of I-215, and the Legacy Parkway.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys
